eventDecorators.name: ChangedNeonAddress
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ChangedRewardPeriod
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ChangedUniswapV2Pair
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ClimedRewards
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyWithdrewToken
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Unstaked
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrewRewards
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: changedDevFeeReciever
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

functionDecorators.name: addEpochReward
functionDecorators.description: Add fee to epoch reward variable Note Call by only NEON token contract.

functionDecorators.name: changeDevFee
functionDecorators.description: Update the dev fee for this contract defaults at 4.00% Note contract owner is meant to be a governance contract allowing NEON governance consensus.

functionDecorators.name: changeDevFeeReciever
functionDecorators.description: Update dev address by the previous dev. Note onlyOwner functions are meant for the governance contract allowing NEON governance token holders to do this functions.

functionDecorators.name: changeNeonAddress
functionDecorators.description: Change NEON Token contract address. Call by only Governance.

functionDecorators.name: changeRewardPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Change value of reward period. Call by only Governance.

functionDecorators.name: changeUniswapV2Pair
functionDecorators.description: Change NEON-ETH Uniswap V2 Pair address. Call by only Governance.

functionDecorators.name: contractStartTime
functionDecorators.description: Return contract started time.

functionDecorators.name: devFee
functionDecorators.description: Return dev fee.

functionDecorators.name: devFeeReciever
functionDecorators.description: Return address of dev fee receiver.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdrawToken
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw NEON token from vault wallet to owner when only emergency!.

functionDecorators.name: getEpochRewards
functionDecorators.description: API to get the epoch rewards.

functionDecorators.name: getEpochTotalStakedAmount
functionDecorators.description: API to get the total epoch staked amount of all stakers.

functionDecorators.name: getRewards
functionDecorators.description: API to get staker's rewards.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalStakedAmount
functionDecorators.description: API to get the total staked amount of all stakers.

functionDecorators.name: getUserEpochStakedAmount
functionDecorators.description: API to get the staker's staked amount.

functionDecorators.name: getUserTotalStakedAmount
functionDecorators.description: API to get the staker's staked amount.

functionDecorators.name: governance
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: neonAddress
functionDecorators.description: Return address of NEON Token contract.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyGovernance` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Return value of reward period.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Stake NEON-ETH LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: uniswapV2Pair
functionDecorators.description: Return address of NEON-ETH Uniswap V2 pair.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Unstake staked NEON-ETH LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawRewards
functionDecorators.description: API to withdraw rewards to staker's wallet.
